course_description: Students are introduced to the evaluation and management of the most common episodic and chronic health problems of adults and children seen in primary care settings. Focus is on culture and health disparities, risk reduction, health promotion and chronic disease management.
sections: Class Nbr: 3223, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2-3:50p, Instructor: A. Becklenberg, Status: Open
